engChrName: You've REALLY gone and done it this time, you filthy spriggan trash.
engSearchText:
You've REALLY gone and done it this time, you
filthy spriggan trash.
jpnChrName: ……そんな手を……… やってくれるじゃないか、裏解決屋ァ。
jpnSearchText:
……そんな手を………
やってくれるじゃないか、裏解決屋ァ。

engChrName: So this is the interior of Vashtar Palace.
engSearchText: So this is the interior of Vashtar Palace.
jpnChrName: ここが、ヴァシュタール宮……
jpnSearchText: ここが、ヴァシュタール宮……

engChrName: It must have been a sight to behold before the monarch was overthrown a century ago.
engSearchText:
It must have been a sight to behold before the
monarch was overthrown a century ago.
jpnChrName: 百年前に滅びた、 旧カルバード王家の遺構か。
jpnSearchText:
百年前に滅びた、
旧カルバード王家の遺構か。

engChrName: Almost time for our final battle.
engSearchText: Almost time for our final battle.
jpnChrName: ……居るんですね、この先に。
jpnSearchText: ……居るんですね、この先に。

engChrName: Indeed. Though I am unsure of what to expect from the remaining Almata members.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Though I am unsure of what to expect from
the remaining Almata members.
jpnChrName: ええ、残っている顔触れは あまりに底知れませんが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、残っている顔触れは
あまりに底知れませんが……

engChrName: I'll tell you what we can expect. They'll come at us, and we'll beat their asses to a bloody pulp.
engSearchText:
I'll tell you what we can expect. They'll come at us,
and we'll beat their asses to a bloody pulp.
jpnChrName: 関係ねぇ── 最後の落とし前を付けるだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
関係ねぇ──
最後の落とし前を付けるだけだ。

engChrName: And we'll stop them from detonating the bomb.
engSearchText: And we'll stop them from detonating the bomb.
jpnChrName: そして何よりも 反応兵器を絶対に止める……！
jpnSearchText:
そして何よりも
反応兵器を絶対に止める……！

engChrName: Sounds like a plan. Let's get this party started!
engSearchText: Sounds like a plan. Let's get this party started!
jpnChrName: よおっしっ、気合入れていくわよ！
jpnSearchText: よおっしっ、気合入れていくわよ！

engChrName: Time to put the pedal to the metal and go after 'em— full speed ahead!
engSearchText:
Time to put the pedal to the metal and go after 'em—
full speed ahead!
jpnChrName: 迷う造りじゃなさそうだ、 一気に駆け抜けるぞ──！
jpnSearchText:
迷う造りじゃなさそうだ、
一気に駆け抜けるぞ──！

engChrName: Finally. You sure took your sweet-ass time.
engSearchText: Finally. You sure took your sweet-ass time.
jpnChrName: 来たな、待ちくたびれたぜ。
jpnSearchText: 来たな、待ちくたびれたぜ。

engChrName: Arioch!
engSearchText: Arioch!
jpnChrName: アリオッチ……！
jpnSearchText: アリオッチ……！

engChrName: I guess I should've expected to find him here.
engSearchText: I guess I should've expected to find him here.
jpnChrName: ここで現れるということは……
jpnSearchText: ここで現れるということは……

engChrName: I assume we must defeat you first before we get to Dantès?
engSearchText:
I assume we must defeat you first before we get
to Dantès?
jpnChrName: ジェラール・ダンテスへの道を塞ぐ、 “最後の守護者”というわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
ジェラール・ダンテスへの道を塞ぐ、
“最後の守護者”というわけですか。

engChrName: Heh. You got that right, pretty lady.
engSearchText: Heh. You got that right, pretty lady.
jpnChrName: クク……ああそうだ。
jpnSearchText: クク……ああそうだ。

engChrName: We couldn't really go at it in the labyrinth, but there's nothin' stopping us from fighting to the death now.
engSearchText:
We couldn't really go at it in the labyrinth, but there's
nothin' stopping us from fighting to the death now.
jpnChrName: さっきはやり損なったが、 存分に死合うとしようじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
さっきはやり損なったが、
存分に死合うとしようじゃねえか。

engChrName: This place ain't got any of the resplendence it had when I came here in the bygone days...
engSearchText:
This place ain't got any of the resplendence it had
when I came here in the bygone days...
jpnChrName: ま、大昔に来た時の壮麗さは カケラも無くなっちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、大昔に来た時の壮麗さは
カケラも無くなっちまったが……

engChrName: ...but this decrepit, old ruin makes for a kickass backdrop for our fight, don't ya think?
engSearchText:
...but this decrepit, old ruin makes for a kickass
backdrop for our fight, don't ya think?
jpnChrName: 廃墟は廃墟でオツなもんだ。 お互いに最高の舞台にしようぜ？
jpnSearchText:
廃墟は廃墟でオツなもんだ。
お互いに最高の舞台にしようぜ？

engChrName: Wait...
engSearchText: Wait...

engChrName: What do you mean by 'when I came here in the bygone days'?
engSearchText:
What do you mean by 'when I came here in the
bygone days'?
jpnChrName: 大昔に来た、って……
jpnSearchText: 大昔に来た、って……

engChrName: I know the answer to that. There was a report on him from the East eight years ago—one that I had trouble believing at first.
engSearchText:
I know the answer to that. There was a report on him
from the East eight years ago—one that I had trouble
believing at first.
jpnChrName: やはり……８年前の 東よりの報告でよもやとは思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
やはり……８年前の
東よりの報告でよもやとは思ったが。

engChrName: You were born in a different era, weren't you?
engSearchText: You were born in a different era, weren't you?
jpnChrName: ──おぬし、 この時代の生まれではないのだな？
jpnSearchText:
──おぬし、
この時代の生まれではないのだな？

engChrName: Oh, did I never mention that? Whoops.
engSearchText: Oh, did I never mention that? Whoops.
jpnChrName: ああ、言ってなかったか？
jpnSearchText: ああ、言ってなかったか？

engChrName: I was born a long time ago—before your grandparents were in diapers, in fact. Back in my day, the Holy Iskan Empire still stood firm.
engSearchText:
I was born a long time ago—before your grandparents
were in diapers, in fact. Back in my day, the Holy
Iskan Empire still stood firm.
jpnChrName: 俺は《イスカ神聖皇国》が まだあった時代の生まれでな。
jpnSearchText:
俺は《イスカ神聖皇国》が
まだあった時代の生まれでな。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: なんだと……！？

engChrName: Th-The Holy Iskan Empire? You mean the one that ruled over the entire eastern side of the continent?
engSearchText:
Th-The Holy Iskan Empire? You mean the one that
ruled over the entire eastern side of the continent?
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待って。 神聖皇国って、確か……
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと待って。
神聖皇国って、確か……

engChrName: As I recall, it fell about 130 years ago.
engSearchText: As I recall, it fell about 130 years ago.
jpnChrName: 大陸東部全域を治めていたという、 １３０年前に滅びた超大国ですね……
jpnSearchText:
大陸東部全域を治めていたという、
１３０年前に滅びた超大国ですね……

engChrName: So he's over 130 years old? How is that possible?
engSearchText: So he's over 130 years old? How is that possible?
jpnChrName: ……一体、貴方は……
jpnSearchText: ……一体、貴方は……

engChrName: Probably 'cause of the artifacts. I'm guessin' the halberd and armor are what's keepin' you alive, yeah?
engSearchText:
Probably 'cause of the artifacts. I'm guessin' the
halberd and armor are what's keepin' you alive, yeah?
jpnChrName: どうやらその斧槍と鎧…… 古代遺物（アーティファクト）の力みたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
どうやらその斧槍と鎧……
古代遺物（アーティファクト）の力みたいだな？

engChrName: Uh-huh. They're called the Fangs of Rahu, and they've been passed down in my old tribe for generations.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh. They're called the Fangs of Rahu, and
they've been passed down in my old tribe
for generations.
jpnChrName: ああ、《羅睺（らごう）の牙》っつう代物でな。 俺の一族が代々受け継いできたモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《羅睺（らごう）の牙》っつう代物でな。
俺の一族が代々受け継いできたモンだ。

engChrName: My people were from the West, and we all served the Iskan emperor. I once visited the Iskan Empire while escortin' a goodwill ambassador.
engSearchText:
My people were from the West, and we all served the
Iskan emperor. I once visited the Iskan Empire while
escortin' a goodwill ambassador.
jpnChrName: 元々《皇（すめらぎ）》に仕える西方系の一派で、 親善使節の護衛で訪れた時の事は覚えてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
元々《皇（すめらぎ）》に仕える西方系の一派で、
親善使節の護衛で訪れた時の事は覚えてるぜ。

engChrName: Then the empire fell shortly after I returned home from that trip. Most of my tribe died with it.
engSearchText:
Then the empire fell shortly after I returned home
from that trip. Most of my tribe died with it.
jpnChrName: ──だが帰国してすぐに皇国は崩壊し、 一族の大半が滅びちまった。
jpnSearchText:
──だが帰国してすぐに皇国は崩壊し、
一族の大半が滅びちまった。

engChrName: 'Cept me, of course. Thanks to these things, I'm still alive and kickin'.
engSearchText:
'Cept me, of course. Thanks to these things, I'm still
alive and kickin'.
jpnChrName: この斧槍と鎧に生かされ続けた俺を除いて。
jpnSearchText: この斧槍と鎧に生かされ続けた俺を除いて。

engChrName: After that, I spent my days wanderin' the desolate wastelands of the East.
engSearchText:
After that, I spent my days wanderin' the desolate
wastelands of the East.
jpnChrName: ──気付いた時には、俺は荒れ果てた 東の大地をコイツと共に彷徨っていた。
jpnSearchText:
──気付いた時には、俺は荒れ果てた
東の大地をコイツと共に彷徨っていた。

engChrName: Bandits and jaegers made a habit of pickin' fights with me, and I'd murder 'em all to quench the fangs' unquenchable thirst.
engSearchText:
Bandits and jaegers made a habit of pickin' fights
with me, and I'd murder 'em all to quench the fangs'
unquenchable thirst.
jpnChrName: “牙”がもたらす渇望を満たすように、 たまに絡んでくる野盗や猟兵を皆殺しにする。
jpnSearchText:
“牙”がもたらす渇望を満たすように、
たまに絡んでくる野盗や猟兵を皆殺しにする。

engChrName: That was the life I lived for over a century, but it all came to an abrupt end when the church set their sights on me.
engSearchText:
That was the life I lived for over a century, but it all
came to an abrupt end when the church set their
sights on me.
jpnChrName: そんな暮らしを一世紀以上続けてたせいか、 とうとう教会の連中にも目を付けられてな。
jpnSearchText:
そんな暮らしを一世紀以上続けてたせいか、
とうとう教会の連中にも目を付けられてな。

engChrName: They branded me a heretic and hunted me like a dog. Then one day, while I was busy fightin' off some of 'em, a group of assassins came to help me out.
engSearchText:
They branded me a heretic and hunted me like a dog.
Then one day, while I was busy fightin' off some of
'em, a group of assassins came to help me out.
jpnChrName: “外法”として討伐しにきた連中を 返り討ちにする時アイツらに助太刀されたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
“外法”として討伐しにきた連中を
返り討ちにする時アイツらに助太刀されたんだ。

engChrName: They'd only just started up at that point, and they were sniffin' around for new hires. They offered me a place among 'em.
engSearchText:
They'd only just started up at that point, and they
were sniffin' around for new hires. They offered me a
place among 'em.
jpnChrName: ちょうど立ち上げたばかりっつう組織の 戦力を探してたらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど立ち上げたばかりっつう組織の
戦力を探してたらしくてな。

engChrName: And who was I to say no? I'd spent a hundred years in the wastelands, so bein' an overseer sounded like the sweetest deal in the world to me.
engSearchText:
And who was I to say no? I'd spent a hundred years in
the wastelands, so bein' an overseer sounded like the
sweetest deal in the world to me.
jpnChrName: いいかげん東の荒野にも飽きてた俺は 奴らの誘いに乗り、管理人ってのを引き受けた。
jpnSearchText:
いいかげん東の荒野にも飽きてた俺は
奴らの誘いに乗り、管理人ってのを引き受けた。

engChrName: Eventually, the Emperor kicked the bucket, which prompted Melchior to find us a sponsor.
engSearchText:
Eventually, the Emperor kicked the bucket, which
prompted Melchior to find us a sponsor.
jpnChrName: それからエンペラーがくたばり、 メルキオルが面白いスポンサーを見つけて──
jpnSearchText:
それからエンペラーがくたばり、
メルキオルが面白いスポンサーを見つけて──

engChrName: And, well, you know the rest of the story from there.
engSearchText: And, well, you know the rest of the story from there.
jpnChrName: ま、そこから先はお前らも知っての通りだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そこから先はお前らも知っての通りだ。

engChrName: So the artifacts cursed you with eternal life...
engSearchText: So the artifacts cursed you with eternal life...
jpnChrName: 遺物に呪われて生き続ける存在……
jpnSearchText: 遺物に呪われて生き続ける存在……

engChrName: It's not unlike what happened with the Immortals, though the circumstances are different.
engSearchText:
It's not unlike what happened with the Immortals,
though the circumstances are different.
jpnChrName: ……同じ“不死者”でも、 わたしの知ってるのとは随分違うね。
jpnSearchText:
……同じ“不死者”でも、
わたしの知ってるのとは随分違うね。

engChrName: It reminds me of the Immortals of the Erebonian Empire, though the circumstances are rather different.
engSearchText:
It reminds me of the Immortals of the Erebonian
Empire, though the circumstances are
rather different.
jpnChrName: 屍鬼や帝国の“不死者”とは 全く違う存在のようですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
屍鬼や帝国の“不死者”とは
全く違う存在のようですねぇ。

engChrName: You were part of the Rahu tribe, one of the nine peoples of the Navagraha.
engSearchText:
You were part of the Rahu tribe, one of the nine
peoples of the Navagraha.
jpnChrName: ……やはり九曜衆が一、 《羅睺（らごう）衆》の生き残りだったか。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり九曜衆が一、
《羅睺（らごう）衆》の生き残りだったか。

engChrName: Reminds me a little of the Steel Maiden.
engSearchText: Reminds me a little of the Steel Maiden.
jpnChrName: ハン……ウチにいた“鋼”とは ずいぶん違うみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……ウチにいた“鋼”とは
ずいぶん違うみてぇだが。

engChrName: So you're the Invisible Tempest—the walking monstrosity who mercilessly slaughters his victims and leaves no witnesses to tell the tale.
engSearchText:
So you're the Invisible Tempest—the walking
monstrosity who mercilessly slaughters his victims
and leaves no witnesses to tell the tale.
jpnChrName: 一切の目撃者も残さず 鏖殺の限りを尽くす《姿無き厄災（インビジブルテンペスト）》──
jpnSearchText:
一切の目撃者も残さず
鏖殺の限りを尽くす《姿無き厄災（インビジブルテンペスト）》──

engChrName: Even I had no idea that such an infamous heretic was leading one of the Gardens.
engSearchText:
Even I had no idea that such an infamous heretic was
leading one of the Gardens.
jpnChrName: 悪しき伝説と謳われ、外法認定された魔人が よもや“庭園”と合流していようとはな……
jpnSearchText:
悪しき伝説と謳われ、外法認定された魔人が
よもや“庭園”と合流していようとはな……

engChrName: You seem way more into working with Almata than the chick with the angel did.
engSearchText:
You seem way more into working with Almata than
the chick with the angel did.
jpnChrName: その上、人形娘とは違って前向きに アルマータに乗っかってるわけか……
jpnSearchText:
その上、人形娘とは違って前向きに
アルマータに乗っかってるわけか……

engChrName: Don't think you're enjoyin' it as much as Melchior, but it's easy to tell you're getting a real kick outta this.
engSearchText:
Don't think you're enjoyin' it as much as Melchior,
but it's easy to tell you're getting a real kick outta this.
jpnChrName: ……メルキオルほどじゃないにせよ、 アンタ、この謝肉祭を愉しんでやがるな？
jpnSearchText:
……メルキオルほどじゃないにせよ、
アンタ、この謝肉祭を愉しんでやがるな？

engChrName: Haha. Course I am.
engSearchText: Haha. Course I am.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、当たり前だろうが？
jpnSearchText: ハハハ、当たり前だろうが？

engChrName: When I'm workin' with these guys, I just feel so alive.
engSearchText: When I'm workin' with these guys, I just feel so alive.
jpnChrName: ──これほど“生きてる”実感を 得られる舞台はそうあるモンじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
──これほど“生きてる”実感を
得られる舞台はそうあるモンじゃねえ。

engChrName: But all good things gotta come to an end at some point, and this carnival's about to reach its climax.
engSearchText:
But all good things gotta come to an end at some
point, and this carnival's about to reach its climax.
jpnChrName: そしていよいよそいつは クライマックスに近づいている……
jpnSearchText:
そしていよいよそいつは
クライマックスに近づいている……

engChrName: All right, enough talk. I can't wait a minute longer, so let's get this show on the road.
engSearchText:
All right, enough talk. I can't wait a minute longer, so
let's get this show on the road.
jpnChrName: クク……そろそろ我慢の限界でな。 とっととおっぱじめるとしようぜ……？
jpnSearchText:
クク……そろそろ我慢の限界でな。
とっととおっぱじめるとしようぜ……？

engChrName: I ain't gotta play the rules' enforcer anymore. I'm finally free to go all out!
engSearchText:
I ain't gotta play the rules' enforcer anymore.
I'm finally free to go all out!
jpnChrName: 制限された“ルールの番人”もお役御免だ。 最大限に解放して戦えそうだからなア……！
jpnSearchText:
制限された“ルールの番人”もお役御免だ。
最大限に解放して戦えそうだからなア……！

engChrName: Tch!
engSearchText: Tch!
jpnSearchText: ……チッ……！

engChrName: Be on your guard, everyone! He's unleashing the artifacts' full power!
engSearchText:
Be on your guard, everyone! He's unleashing the
artifacts' full power!
jpnChrName: 脅威度不明──古代遺物の力を 限界まで引き出しているようです……！
jpnSearchText:
脅威度不明──古代遺物の力を
限界まで引き出しているようです……！

engChrName: *sigh* Talk about disappointing.
engSearchText: *sigh* Talk about disappointing.
jpnChrName: ──ホント、 ガッカリさせてくれるわね、アンタ。
jpnSearchText:
──ホント、
ガッカリさせてくれるわね、アンタ。

engChrName: Come again?
engSearchText: Come again?
jpnChrName: アア……？
jpnSearchText: アア……？

engChrName: I had my expectations raised when you said you wanted me specifically to take part in this 'carnival'...
engSearchText:
I had my expectations raised when you said you
wanted me specifically to take part in this 'carnival'...
jpnChrName: 龍來に現れて、あたしも“祭り”に 来て欲しいとか散々煽っておいて……
jpnSearchText:
龍來に現れて、あたしも“祭り”に
来て欲しいとか散々煽っておいて……

engChrName: ...and those expectations were thoroughly dashed. Is this really the best entertainment you can offer?
engSearchText:
...and those expectations were thoroughly dashed.
Is this really the best entertainment you can offer?
jpnChrName: 楽しませてくれるのはその程度だっていうの？
jpnSearchText: 楽しませてくれるのはその程度だっていうの？

engChrName: Judith...
engSearchText: Judith...
jpnChrName: ジュディスさん……
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさん……
……ハン………？

engChrName: Heheh. I love a woman with spunk.
engSearchText: Heheh. I love a woman with spunk.
jpnChrName: クク、言うじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: クク、言うじゃねえか。

engChrName: You and I got some things in common. We're both thrill-seekers: you find yours from actin' and thievin', I get mine from chopping heads off bodies.
engSearchText:
You and I got some things in common. We're both
thrill-seekers: you find yours from actin' and thievin',
I get mine from chopping heads off bodies.
jpnChrName: だったら女優に怪盗だったか── ２つの顔を持つアンタが。
jpnSearchText:
だったら女優に怪盗だったか──
２つの顔を持つアンタが。

engChrName: Also like you, I'm hard to please. Do you really think you can quench my ravenous thirst for a good fight?
engSearchText:
Also like you, I'm hard to please. Do you really think
you can quench my ravenous thirst for a good fight?
jpnChrName: この俺の“乾き”を満たしてくれんのか……？
jpnSearchText: この俺の“乾き”を満たしてくれんのか……？

engChrName: Yes, I do. I'm going to put on one hell of a show just for you.
engSearchText:
Yes, I do. I'm going to put on one hell of a show just
for you.
jpnChrName: ええ──どちらとしても見過ごせない。
jpnSearchText: ええ──どちらとしても見過ごせない。

engChrName: You should feel lucky. I'm going to give you my undivided attention—because I won't let a potential fan live a cursed and meaningless existence.
engSearchText:
You should feel lucky. I'm going to give you my
undivided attention—because I won't let a potential
fan live a cursed and meaningless existence.
jpnChrName: 呪いに操られるまま無為な時を過ごし続ける、 “空っぽ”のファン候補がいるってことは。
jpnSearchText:
呪いに操られるまま無為な時を過ごし続ける、
“空っぽ”のファン候補がいるってことは。
……！

engChrName: Consider this my calling card—from the Phantom Thief Grimcat to Arioch the Eradicator:
engSearchText:
Consider this my calling card—from the Phantom
Thief Grimcat to Arioch the Eradicator:
jpnChrName: だから怪盗グリムキャッツとして、 映画女優ジュディスとして予告する……
jpnSearchText:
だから怪盗グリムキャッツとして、
映画女優ジュディスとして予告する……

engChrName: I'm going to bring you to your knees, and I'll steal your empty heart right before you!
engSearchText:
I'm going to bring you to your knees, and I'll steal
your empty heart right before you!
jpnChrName: 空っぽのアンタの“心”── 華麗に盗んで叩きのめしてあげるってね！
jpnSearchText:
空っぽのアンタの“心”──
華麗に盗んで叩きのめしてあげるってね！

engChrName: *whistle*
engSearchText: *whistle*
jpnChrName: ヒュウ……！
jpnSearchText: ヒュウ……！

engChrName: You go, Judith!
engSearchText: You go, Judith!
jpnChrName: ジュディス……！
jpnSearchText: ジュディス……！

engChrName: Heh. Hell yeah.
engSearchText: Heh. Hell yeah.
jpnChrName: ハッ、いい啖呵だ──！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、いい啖呵だ──！

engChrName: You tell him, sister!
engSearchText: You tell him, sister!
jpnChrName: カッコイイです、ジュディスさん！
jpnSearchText: カッコイイです、ジュディスさん！

engChrName: Haha. What an adorable little proclamation.
engSearchText: Haha. What an adorable little proclamation.
jpnChrName: はは、言うなぁ……！
jpnSearchText: はは、言うなぁ……！

engChrName: Heehee. Impressive.
engSearchText: Heehee. Impressive.
jpnChrName: うふふ、決めはるなぁ……♪
jpnSearchText: うふふ、決めはるなぁ……♪

engChrName: Hahaha... AHAHAHA! You'll steal my heart? That's the funniest shit I've heard all week.
engSearchText:
Hahaha... AHAHAHA! You'll steal my heart?
That's the funniest shit I've heard all week.
jpnChrName: クク……ハハハハハ……！！ 面白ぇ、だったら魅せてもらおうか──
jpnSearchText:
クク……ハハハハハ……！！
面白ぇ、だったら魅せてもらおうか──

engChrName: If you think you can fill the bottomless void deep within me, then you're welcome to try!
engSearchText:
If you think you can fill the bottomless void
deep within me, then you're welcome to try!
jpnChrName: てめぇらのチカラでどこまで 俺の“隙間”を埋められるのかをなああッッ！！
jpnSearchText:
てめぇらのチカラでどこまで
俺の“隙間”を埋められるのかをなああッッ！！

engChrName: Too easy!
engSearchText: Too easy!
jpnChrName: 甘ぇえええッッ！！
jpnSearchText: 甘ぇえええッッ！！

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: おおっ！？
jpnSearchText: おおっ！？

engChrName: Now!
engSearchText: Now!
jpnChrName: ここだ……！
jpnSearchText: ここだ……！

engChrName: It's...over!
engSearchText: It's...over!
jpnChrName: これで──フィナーレよっ！！
jpnSearchText: これで──フィナーレよっ！！

engChrName: W-We did it!
engSearchText: W-We did it!
jpnChrName: や、やった……！
jpnSearchText: や、やった……！

engChrName: Exceptional work. You managed to break the artifacts' core.
engSearchText:
Exceptional work. You managed to break the
artifacts' core.
jpnChrName: 見事──遺物の“核”を砕いたか。
jpnSearchText: 見事──遺物の“核”を砕いたか。

engChrName: Haha... That really WAS a hell of a show.
engSearchText: Haha... That really WAS a hell of a show.
jpnChrName: ……ハハ………すげえな今の………
jpnSearchText: ……ハハ………すげえな今の………

engChrName: Well, of course! I did promise as much. And I even recreated Golden Blood's climax just for you.
engSearchText:
Well, of course! I did promise as much. And I even
recreated Golden Blood's climax just for you.
jpnChrName: フフン、《ゴールデンブラッド》の クライマックスの再現──効いたでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
フフン、《ゴールデンブラッド》の
クライマックスの再現──効いたでしょ？

engChrName: Didn't see that coming at all.
engSearchText: Didn't see that coming at all.
jpnChrName: ああ……それで、かよ………
jpnSearchText: ああ……それで、かよ………

engChrName: Wh-What's going on?!
engSearchText: Wh-What's going on?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと……！？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっと……！？

engChrName: W-Wait, is this...?
engSearchText: W-Wait, is this...?
jpnChrName: ま、まさか……
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか……

engChrName: It's just like what happened to Aida...
engSearchText: It's just like what happened to Aida...
jpnChrName: アイーダさんと同じ……？
jpnSearchText: アイーダさんと同じ……？

engChrName: Haha... You are one captivatin' gal, you know that? It's like you were commandin' my attention in that fight...
engSearchText:
Haha... You are one captivatin' gal, you know that?
It's like you were commandin' my attention in
that fight...
jpnChrName: ……クク……死合いの最中だってのに…… つい見惚れちまったぜ……
jpnSearchText:
……クク……死合いの最中だってのに……
つい見惚れちまったぜ……

engChrName: ...and in the movie I saw last night.
engSearchText: ...and in the movie I saw last night.
jpnChrName: ……昨夜観た…………みたいに……
jpnSearchText: ……昨夜観た…………みたいに……

engChrName: Wait, you went to the movies? Did you actually go to see Gold—
engSearchText:
Wait, you went to the movies? Did you actually go to
see Gold—
jpnChrName: ……ねえ！ ひょっとして北街区の映画館で──
jpnSearchText:
……ねえ！
ひょっとして北街区の映画館で──

engChrName: Victory is yours. You said you'd bring me to my knees, and you did just that.
engSearchText:
Victory is yours. You said you'd bring me to my
knees, and you did just that.
jpnChrName: てめぇらの勝ちだ…… ……“玉座”への道は開かれた……
jpnSearchText:
てめぇらの勝ちだ……
……“玉座”への道は開かれた……

engChrName: The path to Dantès is open. He's all that remains now. Melchior will just be there as a witness.
engSearchText:
The path to Dantès is open. He's all that
remains now. Melchior will just be there as a witness.
jpnChrName: 残るはジェラールの旦那のみ── メルキオルは見届け役となるだろう……
jpnSearchText:
残るはジェラールの旦那のみ──
メルキオルは見届け役となるだろう……

engChrName: Let's hope you can stand up to the boss' fear. Heheh. Or else your legs might give out from under you.
engSearchText:
Let's hope you can stand up to the boss' fear. Heheh.
Or else your legs might give out from under you.
jpnChrName: 旦那の“恐怖”に抗えるか…… ……クク、精々足掻いてみせるんだな──……
jpnSearchText:
旦那の“恐怖”に抗えるか……
……クク、精々足掻いてみせるんだな──……
………………………………

engChrName: If you really did go to see it, you could've at least shared your impressions with me...
engSearchText:
If you really did go to see it, you could've at least
shared your impressions with me...
jpnChrName: ……もし観てたんなら 何か感想くらい言いなさいよ……
jpnSearchText:
……もし観てたんなら
何か感想くらい言いなさいよ……

engChrName: Judith...
engSearchText: Judith...
jpnChrName: ジュディス……
jpnSearchText: ジュディス……

engChrName: Guess that's one mystery that'll stay forever unsolved.
engSearchText:
Guess that's one mystery that'll stay
forever unsolved.
jpnChrName: ハン……今となっちゃ 答えは永遠に分からなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……今となっちゃ
答えは永遠に分からなさそうだが。

engChrName: But at the very least he seemed...satisfied as he passed, somehow.
engSearchText:
But at the very least he seemed...satisfied as he
passed, somehow.
jpnChrName: ……でもどこか……… 納得したような表情だったと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……でもどこか………
納得したような表情だったと思います。

engChrName: Yeah. Maybe you managed to fill some of that empty heart of his right at the end.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Maybe you managed to fill some of that empty
heart of his right at the end.
jpnChrName: ああ──ヤツの“隙間”、 少しは埋められたんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ヤツの“隙間”、
少しは埋められたんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Heh. One can only hope.
engSearchText: Heh. One can only hope.
jpnChrName: フフ……だといいわね。
jpnSearchText: フフ……だといいわね。

engChrName: All right, I'm done stealing the spotlight. I'll hand over the reins to the rest of you.
engSearchText:
All right, I'm done stealing the spotlight. I'll hand
over the reins to the rest of you.
jpnChrName: ──出しゃばっちゃったけど ここから先は《裏解決屋（あんたたち）》の出番よ。
jpnSearchText:
──出しゃばっちゃったけど
ここから先は《裏解決屋（あんたたち）》の出番よ。

engChrName: Oh, but I'm not planning on slacking off now. I may be a temp employee, but I'm still gonna give this my all!
engSearchText:
Oh, but I'm not planning on slacking off now. I may
be a temp employee, but I'm still gonna give this
my all!
jpnChrName: 勿論、臨時バイトとして 最後まで力になってあげるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、臨時バイトとして
最後まで力になってあげるけどね。

engChrName: Naturally. I expect nothin' less from all my employees—temp or perm.
engSearchText:
Naturally. I expect nothin' less from all my
employees—temp or perm.
jpnChrName: ああ──頼りにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──頼りにしてるぜ。

engChrName: The next fight'll be our last. Then this madness will finally be behind us.
engSearchText:
The next fight'll be our last. Then this madness will
finally be behind us.
jpnChrName: ……次はいよいよ“ゲーム”の最終戦だ。
jpnSearchText: ……次はいよいよ“ゲーム”の最終戦だ。

engChrName: Get ready, everyone. We're gonna go in there and make Dantès pay for all his crimes!
engSearchText:
Get ready, everyone. We're gonna go in there and
make Dantès pay for all his crimes!
jpnChrName: 万全の態勢でジェラールをブチのめし、 ゲームに勝って落とし前をつけさせるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
万全の態勢でジェラールをブチのめし、
ゲームに勝って落とし前をつけさせるぞ！

engChrName: Right! / Very well!
engSearchText: Right! / Very well!
jpnChrName: おおっ！
jpnSearchText: おおっ！

engChrName: Welcome to my humble abode.
engSearchText: Welcome to my humble abode.
jpnChrName: ようこそ──我が玉座へ。
jpnSearchText: ようこそ──我が玉座へ。

engChrName: Ahaha! And here I was thinking that Arioch would wipe the floor with you, but you did that to him.
engSearchText:
Ahaha! And here I was thinking that Arioch would
wipe the floor with you, but you did that to him.
jpnChrName: あはは、まさかアリオッチを “終わらせて”あげるとはねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、まさかアリオッチを
“終わらせて”あげるとはねぇ！

engChrName: And we're gonna do the same to Dantès!
engSearchText: And we're gonna do the same to Dantès!
jpnChrName: ジェラール・ダンテス──！
jpnSearchText: ジェラール・ダンテス──！

engChrName: You better stay out of our way, Melchior!
engSearchText: You better stay out of our way, Melchior!
jpnChrName: メルキオルも……！
jpnSearchText: メルキオルも……！

engChrName: Of course, of course. Just pretend like I'm invisible.
engSearchText: Of course, of course. Just pretend like I'm invisible.
jpnChrName: ああ、僕のことは気にしないでよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、僕のことは気にしないでよ。

engChrName: I will merely serve as an idle spectator. I wouldn't dream of spoiling the boss' big moment. ♪
engSearchText:
I will merely serve as an idle spectator. I wouldn't
dream of spoiling the boss' big moment. ♪
jpnChrName: せっかくのボスの晴れ舞台だ、 余計な手出しをするつもりはないからさ♪
jpnSearchText:
せっかくのボスの晴れ舞台だ、
余計な手出しをするつもりはないからさ♪

engChrName: Though I do wish I could join in on the fun. I'd love to grab the neck of that wretched vermin who called that airship—and give a nice, long squeeze.
engSearchText:
Though I do wish I could join in on the fun. I'd love
to grab the neck of that wretched vermin who called
that airship—and give a nice, long squeeze.
jpnChrName: ……あの飛行船を呼んだ誰かには 個人的に拍手を贈りたいけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……あの飛行船を呼んだ誰かには
個人的に拍手を贈りたいけどねぇ。
っ………

engChrName: Heh. Worry not, Melchior.
engSearchText: Heh. Worry not, Melchior.
jpnChrName: クク……捨て置け。
jpnSearchText: クク……捨て置け。

engChrName: The passengers will have the distinct honor of witnessing their homes, families, and friends explode before their very eyes.
engSearchText:
The passengers will have the distinct honor of
witnessing their homes, families, and friends explode
before their very eyes.
jpnChrName: 住んでいた街が、家族が、大人たちが 消し飛ぶのを遙か高みから目撃する……
jpnSearchText:
住んでいた街が、家族が、大人たちが
消し飛ぶのを遙か高みから目撃する……

engChrName: All they can do is watch helplessly from above as their former lives go up in flames. I can hardly imagine a more perfect gift of fear.
engSearchText:
All they can do is watch helplessly from above as their
former lives go up in flames. I can hardly imagine a
more perfect gift of fear.
jpnChrName: ──そんな“恐怖”を 子供たちに贈るのも一興だろう。
jpnSearchText:
──そんな“恐怖”を
子供たちに贈るのも一興だろう。
……！

engChrName: You bastard...
engSearchText: You bastard...
jpnChrName: ……クソ野郎が………
jpnSearchText: ……クソ野郎が………

engChrName: Does your wickedness know no bounds?
engSearchText: Does your wickedness know no bounds?
jpnChrName: ……よくもそんなことを……
jpnSearchText: ……よくもそんなことを……

engChrName: We didn't come here to chat the night away, asshole. We came here to beat the shit out of you.
engSearchText:
We didn't come here to chat the night away, asshole.
We came here to beat the shit out of you.
jpnChrName: 余計な御託は結構だ── いい加減このゲームもウンザリでな。
jpnSearchText:
余計な御託は結構だ──
いい加減このゲームもウンザリでな。

engChrName: Are you just gonna sit on that dumbass throne and hurl cheap taunt after cheap taunt?
engSearchText:
Are you just gonna sit on that dumbass throne and
hurl cheap taunt after cheap taunt?
jpnChrName: わざわざ付き合ってやった相手に 安い挑発は底が知れるってモンだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
わざわざ付き合ってやった相手に
安い挑発は底が知れるってモンだぜ？

engChrName: No, no. We will hold our battle momentarily.
engSearchText: No, no. We will hold our battle momentarily.
jpnChrName: フフ、確かにそうかもしれん。 最早残った“ルール”はただ一つ……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、確かにそうかもしれん。
最早残った“ルール”はただ一つ……

engChrName: And after the victor is determined, the final judgment will be passed.
engSearchText:
And after the victor is determined, the final judgment
will be passed.
jpnChrName: 俺が勝つか、お前たちが勝つか── それにより下される“ジャッジ”のみ。
jpnSearchText:
俺が勝つか、お前たちが勝つか──
それにより下される“ジャッジ”のみ。

engChrName: There's the nuclear weapon.
engSearchText: There's the nuclear weapon.
jpnChrName: 反応、兵器……
jpnSearchText: 反応、兵器……

engChrName: So that's what it looks like.
engSearchText: So that's what it looks like.
jpnChrName: バーゼルの天才教授が 唆されて手がけたっていう……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの天才教授が
唆されて手がけたっていう……

engChrName: It is still incomplete, so there is no need to fear— too much.
engSearchText:
It is still incomplete, so there is no need to fear—
too much.
jpnChrName: 警戒するな、あくまで未完成品だ。
jpnSearchText: 警戒するな、あくまで未完成品だ。

engChrName: It cannot be detonated. At least, not without this key.
engSearchText: It cannot be detonated. At least, not without this key.
jpnChrName: この“遺物”無くしては どうあっても起爆不可能だからな。
jpnSearchText:
この“遺物”無くしては
どうあっても起爆不可能だからな。

engChrName: That's the sword we saw in Dingo's video.
engSearchText: That's the sword we saw in Dingo's video.
jpnChrName: ……映像にも映っていた……
jpnSearchText: ……映像にも映っていた……

engChrName: Just the sight of it is sending chills down my spine.
engSearchText: Just the sight of it is sending chills down my spine.
jpnChrName: なんて禍々しい“息吹”……
jpnSearchText: なんて禍々しい“息吹”……

engChrName: Not surprising. It is a deadly blade that's holy and demonic in nature. Its existence was a closely guarded secret of the royal family of Calvard.
engSearchText:
Not surprising. It is a deadly blade that's holy and
demonic in nature. Its existence was a closely guarded
secret of the royal family of Calvard.
jpnChrName: ……かつてカルバード王家が 秘匿していた“聖剣”にして“魔剣”。
jpnSearchText:
……かつてカルバード王家が
秘匿していた“聖剣”にして“魔剣”。

engChrName: After the kingdom fell, the church attempted to recover it, but no trace of it was ever found.
engSearchText:
After the kingdom fell, the church attempted to
recover it, but no trace of it was ever found.
jpnChrName: 王国滅亡後、教会が回収しようとしたが 結局行方知れずだった特級封印指定物……
jpnSearchText:
王国滅亡後、教会が回収しようとしたが
結局行方知れずだった特級封印指定物……

engChrName: So how in the Goddess' name did you come into possession of Apeiron, the Sword of Divine Darkness?
engSearchText:
So how in the Goddess' name did you come into
possession of Apeiron, the Sword
of Divine Darkness?
jpnChrName: 《聖魔剣アペイロン》── どうしておぬしがそれを持っている？
jpnSearchText:
《聖魔剣アペイロン》──
どうしておぬしがそれを持っている？

engChrName: So that is what it's called.
engSearchText: So that is what it's called.
jpnChrName: そのような名と来歴が……
jpnSearchText: そのような名と来歴が……

engChrName: Wait, why're we only hearing about this now?!
engSearchText: Wait, why're we only hearing about this now?!
jpnChrName: つーか言えよ爺さん……！？
jpnSearchText: つーか言えよ爺さん……！？

engChrName: Heh. This sword has become something of a legend. I understand why you are shocked to see this in my hands.
engSearchText:
Heh. This sword has become something of a legend.
I understand why you are shocked to see this in
my hands.
jpnChrName: クク、半ば伝説上の遺物…… 元守護騎士殿も確信は無かったようだな？
jpnSearchText:
クク、半ば伝説上の遺物……
元守護騎士殿も確信は無かったようだな？

engChrName: Allow me to enlighten you. This very blade was passed down to me. I had the right of its inheritance.
engSearchText:
Allow me to enlighten you. This very blade was
passed down to me. I had the right of its inheritance.
jpnChrName: どうしてという問いへの答えは簡単── 俺が、正統な後継者だからだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうしてという問いへの答えは簡単──
俺が、正統な後継者だからだ。

engChrName: I was born by the name of Gerard Eldarion. I am a descendant of the royalty that once ruled Calvard.
engSearchText:
I was born by the name of Gerard Eldarion. I am a
descendant of the royalty that once ruled Calvard.
jpnChrName: 俺の本名は、ジェラール・エルダリオン。
jpnSearchText: 俺の本名は、ジェラール・エルダリオン。

engChrName: Therefore, both it and the throne are rightfully mine.
engSearchText: Therefore, both it and the throne are rightfully mine.
jpnChrName: これでも旧王家の末裔でな── この玉座に座る権利もあるわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
これでも旧王家の末裔でな──
この玉座に座る権利もあるわけだ。

engChrName: You must be curious as to how a descendant of the royal family still lives and stands before you.
engSearchText:
You must be curious as to how a descendant of the
royal family still lives and stands before you.
jpnChrName: ちなみに滅びた王家がなぜ生きながらえ、 こうして末裔が残っているのかだが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに滅びた王家がなぜ生きながらえ、
こうして末裔が残っているのかだが……

engChrName: That is because I was taken into the care of a cult that is now extinct.
engSearchText:
That is because I was taken into the care of a cult that
is now extinct.
jpnChrName: ──百年前の当時から存在していた “ある教団”に保護されたのが理由だ。
jpnSearchText:
──百年前の当時から存在していた
“ある教団”に保護されたのが理由だ。
……！！
………ぁ……………

engChrName: The D∴G cult...
engSearchText: The D∴G cult...
jpnChrName: Ｄ∴Ｇ、教団……
jpnSearchText: Ｄ∴Ｇ、教団……

engChrName: They were one of the groups that went on to become the Gardens after spreading chaos across the Republic.
engSearchText:
They were one of the groups that went on to become
the Gardens after spreading chaos across
the Republic.
jpnChrName: かつて共和国でも猛威を振るい、 《庭園》の元にもなったという……
jpnSearchText:
かつて共和国でも猛威を振るい、
《庭園》の元にもなったという……

engChrName: Oh, boy! The Oathbreaker must've spilled the tea on that. Yes, the Gardens can trace its roots back to the cult...
engSearchText:
Oh, boy! The Oathbreaker must've spilled the tea
on that. Yes, the Gardens can trace its roots back to
the cult...
jpnChrName: アハハ、破戒に聞いたんだ？ そう、《庭園（僕たち）》のもう一つの“前身”さ！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、破戒に聞いたんだ？
そう、《庭園（僕たち）》のもう一つの“前身”さ！

engChrName: ...as well as the Order of the Moonlight Horse, which he and I once belonged to.
engSearchText:
...as well as the Order of the Moonlight Horse, which
he and I once belonged to.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみにもう一つは破戒本人と 僕が所属していた《月光木馬團》でね。
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみにもう一つは破戒本人と
僕が所属していた《月光木馬團》でね。

engChrName: Then he ran off to the society with your friend the Golden Butterfly and another ex-member, leaving seven-year-old me in the dust all the while.
engSearchText:
Then he ran off to the society with your friend the
Golden Butterfly and another ex-member, leaving
seven-year-old me in the dust all the while.
jpnChrName: そちらの《黄金蝶》ともう一人連れた彼に ７歳で見捨てられちゃったんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの《黄金蝶》ともう一人連れた彼に
７歳で見捨てられちゃったんだけど。

engChrName: Wow, that's some ancient history there. That was, what, three years before I signed up with 'em?
engSearchText:
Wow, that's some ancient history there. That was,
what, three years before I signed up with 'em?
jpnChrName: ハッ……俺が入る３年前か。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……俺が入る３年前か。

engChrName: Oh, that certainly takes me back. I did feel a tinge of guilt for abandoning you at that tender age. I tried to find somewhere for you to start anew.
engSearchText:
Oh, that certainly takes me back. I did feel a tinge of
guilt for abandoning you at that tender age. I tried to
find somewhere for you to start anew.
jpnChrName: 懐かしなぁ……さすがにかわいそ思て 預け先を見つけようとしたんやけど。
jpnSearchText:
懐かしなぁ……さすがにかわいそ思て
預け先を見つけようとしたんやけど。

engChrName: But when I saw how much fun you were having in your new playground, I realized that wasn't necessary.
engSearchText:
But when I saw how much fun you were having in
your new playground, I realized that wasn't necessary.
jpnChrName: アンタ、嬉々として残った連中支配して 組織作りを始めてもうたからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ、嬉々として残った連中支配して
組織作りを始めてもうたからなぁ。

engChrName: And right you were! Imagine receiving an open invitation to create your very own garden of killers! Oh, I was drowning in a sea of blissful ecstasy!
engSearchText:
And right you were! Imagine receiving an open
invitation to create your very own garden of killers!
Oh, I was drowning in a sea of blissful ecstasy!
jpnChrName: ふふ、当然じゃない？ 好きに庭を造っていいって言うんだから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、当然じゃない？
好きに庭を造っていいって言うんだから。

engChrName: Even you had to be impressed with how it all came together.
engSearchText:
Even you had to be impressed with how it all
came together.
jpnChrName: “レティ姉さん”も驚きの出来でしょ？
jpnSearchText: “レティ姉さん”も驚きの出来でしょ？

engChrName: Ohh, yes. Very impressed. You certainly put your skinny back into the task.
engSearchText:
Ohh, yes. Very impressed. You certainly put your
skinny back into the task.
jpnChrName: ああ、そやねぇ。 頑張ったのは誉めてあげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そやねぇ。
頑張ったのは誉めてあげるわ。

engChrName: Ahaha! I worked my pretty little self to the bone!
engSearchText: Ahaha! I worked my pretty little self to the bone!
jpnChrName: あはは、当然だろう……！？
jpnSearchText: あはは、当然だろう……！？

engChrName: Then he ran off to the society with the Golden Butterfly and another ex-member, leaving seven-year-old me in the dust all the while.
engSearchText:
Then he ran off to the society with the Golden
Butterfly and another ex-member, leaving
seven-year-old me in the dust all the while.
jpnChrName: 《黄金蝶》ともう一人連れた彼に ７歳で見捨てられちゃったんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
《黄金蝶》ともう一人連れた彼に
７歳で見捨てられちゃったんだけどね。

engChrName: But he did tell me I could make my very own garden of killers, and oh, did I very much enjoy doing so.
engSearchText:
But he did tell me I could make my very own garden
of killers, and oh, did I very much enjoy doing so.
jpnChrName: でも、好きに庭を造っていいって言われて それはそれで愉しかったもんだよ……！
jpnSearchText:
でも、好きに庭を造っていいって言われて
それはそれで愉しかったもんだよ……！

engChrName: As a result of my efforts, I met the Emperor, herded the remnants of the cult, became acquainted with Arioch and Olympia...
engSearchText:
As a result of my efforts, I met the Emperor, herded
the remnants of the cult, became acquainted with
Arioch and Olympia...
jpnChrName: 皇帝と出会って教団の残存勢力も取り込んで アリオッチやオランピアも仲間にして……！
jpnSearchText:
皇帝と出会って教団の残存勢力も取り込んで
アリオッチやオランピアも仲間にして……！

engChrName: ...and, most important of all, found our wonderful boss shortly after he assumed control of Almata.
engSearchText:
...and, most important of all, found our wonderful
boss shortly after he assumed control of Almata.
jpnChrName: 旧王家の末裔で、元教団幹部司祭だった彼──
jpnSearchText: 旧王家の末裔で、元教団幹部司祭だった彼──

engChrName: I met a descendant of Calvardian royalty and a former high priest of the D∴G cult! How could I perceive it as anything but a fortuitous twist of fate?
engSearchText:
I met a descendant of Calvardian royalty and a former
high priest of the D∴G cult! How could I perceive it
as anything but a fortuitous twist of fate?
jpnChrName: アルマータを掌握したばかりのボスと 運命的な出会いをしたんだから……！！
jpnSearchText:
アルマータを掌握したばかりのボスと
運命的な出会いをしたんだから……！！

engChrName: So what exactly are you all trying to accomplish here?
engSearchText: So what exactly are you all trying to accomplish here?
jpnChrName: そ、それじゃあアンタの目的は……
jpnSearchText: そ、それじゃあアンタの目的は……

engChrName: Are you attempting to restore the Republic's monarchy? Or are you following in the footsteps of the cult?
engSearchText:
Are you attempting to restore the
Republic's monarchy? Or are you following in the
footsteps of the cult?
jpnChrName: 旧王家の末裔として共和国を転覆…… ……もしくは元教団の関係者として……？
jpnSearchText:
旧王家の末裔として共和国を転覆……
……もしくは元教団の関係者として……？

engChrName: Hmph. Neither.
engSearchText: Hmph. Neither.
jpnChrName: ああ──そんなものに興味はない。
jpnSearchText: ああ──そんなものに興味はない。

engChrName: I care nothing for the country's revolution one hundred years ago, nor do I care about the increasing number of immigrants welcomed through its doors.
engSearchText:
I care nothing for the country's revolution one
hundred years ago, nor do I care about the increasing
number of immigrants welcomed through its doors.
jpnChrName: 百年前の民主革命にも、 王権復古にも、増大する移民どもにも。
jpnSearchText:
百年前の民主革命にも、
王権復古にも、増大する移民どもにも。

engChrName: And I will not leech off the teachings of the cult like a parasite—as my parents once did.
engSearchText:
And I will not leech off the teachings of the cult like
a parasite—as my parents once did.
jpnChrName: 親たちが長らえるためだけに 寄生していた教団の教えにもな。
jpnSearchText:
親たちが長らえるためだけに
寄生していた教団の教えにもな。

engChrName: I'm afraid those things bring me no fulfillment whatsoever.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid those things bring me no
fulfillment whatsoever.
jpnChrName: ……そこにあるのはただ、 “終わってしまった”事への退屈さだけ。
jpnSearchText:
……そこにあるのはただ、
“終わってしまった”事への退屈さだけ。

engChrName: I am not the kind of man who obsesses over past glories, nor do I desire to rebel against the Goddess.
engSearchText:
I am not the kind of man who obsesses over past
glories, nor do I desire to rebel against the Goddess.
jpnChrName: 過去への妄執も、女神への反発も。
jpnSearchText: 過去への妄執も、女神への反発も。

engChrName: Everything that drives a human being to action— friendship, work, envy, love...
engSearchText:
Everything that drives a human being to action—
friendship, work, envy, love...
jpnChrName: いや努力も、友情も、愛も、嫉妬も、 およそありとあらゆる人の生の価値すら。
jpnSearchText:
いや努力も、友情も、愛も、嫉妬も、
およそありとあらゆる人の生の価値すら。

engChrName: ...all of it holds no meaning—just an endless source of frivolity and tedium. So I sought a diversion—a reprieve from this vapid world.
engSearchText:
...all of it holds no meaning—just an endless source of
frivolity and tedium. So I sought a diversion—a
reprieve from this vapid world.
jpnChrName: 俺にとってはひたすら退屈── だから求めた、紛らわせてくれるものを。
jpnSearchText:
俺にとってはひたすら退屈──
だから求めた、紛らわせてくれるものを。

engChrName: And I found just the answer I was looking for. The ultimate source of reprieve: fear.
engSearchText:
And I found just the answer I was looking for.
The ultimate source of reprieve: fear.
jpnChrName: そうして見つけたわけだ── “恐怖”という唯一無二の答えをな。
jpnSearchText:
そうして見つけたわけだ──
“恐怖”という唯一無二の答えをな。
っ……

engChrName: You cannot deny that our neighbors in the Erebonian Empire prospered greatly as a result of conflict.
engSearchText:
You cannot deny that our neighbors in the Erebonian
Empire prospered greatly as a result of conflict.
jpnChrName: 帝国は“闘争”によって長き繁栄を得た。
jpnSearchText: 帝国は“闘争”によって長き繁栄を得た。

engChrName: And much like conflict, fear is a fundamental component of human nature.
engSearchText:
And much like conflict, fear is a fundamental
component of human nature.
jpnChrName: だが──それとは別に“恐怖”もまた 人を人らしくする根源たる概念だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが──それとは別に“恐怖”もまた
人を人らしくする根源たる概念だ。

engChrName: Life, death, order, and chaos can only exist because of fear. It is at the heart of everything—the foundation upon which all else exists.
engSearchText:
Life, death, order, and chaos can only exist because
of fear. It is at the heart of everything—the
foundation upon which all else exists.
jpnChrName: 生も死も、秩序も混沌も、 全ての根底には“恐怖”がある。
jpnSearchText:
生も死も、秩序も混沌も、
全ての根底には“恐怖”がある。

engChrName: Once I learned that, I began my lifelong pursuit: to seek out fear in its purest form and instill it in everyone.
engSearchText:
Once I learned that, I began my lifelong pursuit: to
seek out fear in its purest form and instill it
in everyone.
jpnChrName: だから俺は──究極の恐怖を求めた。
jpnSearchText: だから俺は──究極の恐怖を求めた。

engChrName: You're one sick piece of shit, you know that?
engSearchText: You're one sick piece of shit, you know that?
jpnChrName: ……ふざ、けんな………
jpnSearchText: ……ふざ、けんな………

engChrName: So that's why you were drawn to the concept of nuclear weapons...and you got Professor Callaghan wrapped up in your web of lies!
engSearchText:
So that's why you were drawn to the concept of
nuclear weapons...and you got Professor Callaghan
wrapped up in your web of lies!
jpnChrName: そ、それで反応兵器に目をつけて、 キャラハン先生を利用したのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、それで反応兵器に目をつけて、
キャラハン先生を利用したのか……！？

engChrName: Indeed. And he created a wondrous work of art.
engSearchText: Indeed. And he created a wondrous work of art.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かにそいつは“恐怖”の 理想的な体現だと言えるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、確かにそいつは“恐怖”の
理想的な体現だと言えるだろう。

engChrName: But alas. It just isn't good enough on its own.
engSearchText: But alas. It just isn't good enough on its own.
jpnChrName: だが──足りない。
jpnSearchText: だが──足りない。

engChrName: As a weapon, it's too unstable, and it won't leave a permanent mark on the world—even if we were to take the lives of everyone in this city.
engSearchText:
As a weapon, it's too unstable, and it won't leave a
permanent mark on the world—even if we were to
take the lives of everyone in this city.
jpnChrName: 所詮は不安定な兵器、２８万もの住民が 仮に全滅したとしても影響は一時的だろう。
jpnSearchText:
所詮は不安定な兵器、２８万もの住民が
仮に全滅したとしても影響は一時的だろう。

engChrName: People will be dismayed for a time, but like with the Salt Pale and Retributive Tower incidents, they will forget and move on.
engSearchText:
People will be dismayed for a time, but like with
the Salt Pale and Retributive Tower incidents,
they will forget and move on.
jpnChrName: 良くてあのバベル、もしくはノーザンブリアを 壊滅させた《塩の杭》止まり──
jpnSearchText:
良くてあのバベル、もしくはノーザンブリアを
壊滅させた《塩の杭》止まり──

engChrName: And that is what led me to the idea of this carnival.
engSearchText: And that is what led me to the idea of this carnival.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、今回の“謝肉祭”を用意した。
jpnSearchText: だからこそ、今回の“謝肉祭”を用意した。

engChrName: It is the birthplace for the ultimate fear—one that will fester inside every human being for the rest of their lives.
engSearchText:
It is the birthplace for the ultimate fear—one that will
fester inside every human being for the rest of
their lives.
jpnChrName: 反応兵器を越える究極の恐怖を 完成させるための“予行演習”としてな。
jpnSearchText:
反応兵器を越える究極の恐怖を
完成させるための“予行演習”としてな。

engChrName: Now, I grow weary of idle chatter. Shall we begin our duel to the death?
engSearchText:
Now, I grow weary of idle chatter. Shall we begin our
duel to the death?
jpnChrName: ──話はここまでだ。 それでは決着を付けるとしようか？
jpnSearchText:
──話はここまでだ。
それでは決着を付けるとしようか？

engChrName: Sounds good to me. You are SO going down!
engSearchText: Sounds good to me. You are SO going down!
jpnChrName: ……くっ…… ふざけるんじゃないわよ……！！
jpnSearchText:
……くっ……
ふざけるんじゃないわよ……！！

engChrName: This'll be tough, but we can't afford to lose!
engSearchText: This'll be tough, but we can't afford to lose!
jpnChrName: ケタ外れの悪しき息吹……！ ……ですが負けるわけには……！！
jpnSearchText:
ケタ外れの悪しき息吹……！
……ですが負けるわけには……！！

engChrName: We also can't afford to be reckless. I'm almost certain he is up to something.
engSearchText:
We also can't afford to be reckless. I'm almost certain
he is up to something.
jpnChrName: だがあの魔剣だけではない……！ 恐らく彼奴自身にも“何か”がある……！
jpnSearchText:
だがあの魔剣だけではない……！
恐らく彼奴自身にも“何か”がある……！

engChrName: Well, regardless, we've gotta pull out all the stops if we wanna beat this guy!
engSearchText:
Well, regardless, we've gotta pull out all the stops if
we wanna beat this guy!
jpnChrName: ええ、何かは分からんが…… もはや出し惜しみできる相手じゃない！！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、何かは分からんが……
もはや出し惜しみできる相手じゃない！！

engChrName: Be that as it may, we will have to come at him with everything we have if we hope to win!
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, we will have to come at him with
everything we have if we hope to win!
jpnChrName: ええ、何かは分かりませんが…… 出し惜しみできる相手ではありません！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、何かは分かりませんが……
出し惜しみできる相手ではありません！

engChrName: True. But we've still gotta pull out all the stops against him, or we're done for.
engSearchText:
True. But we've still gotta pull out all the stops
against him, or we're done for.
jpnChrName: うん、何かは分からないけど…… 出し惜しみできる相手じゃあないね！
jpnSearchText:
うん、何かは分からないけど……
出し惜しみできる相手じゃあないね！

engChrName: Probably. Still, we've gotta go for broke, otherwise he'll make mincemeat out of us.
engSearchText:
Probably. Still, we've gotta go for broke, otherwise
he'll make mincemeat out of us.
jpnChrName: ケッ、何かは分からねぇが…… 出し惜しみできる相手じゃねえってか！
jpnSearchText:
ケッ、何かは分からねぇが……
出し惜しみできる相手じゃねえってか！

engChrName: Yeah, I know. That's why I'm goin' full throttle from the get-go.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I know. That's why I'm goin' full throttle from
the get-go.
jpnChrName: 分かってる──この最終戦、 最初から全開で行かせてもらうぜ……
jpnSearchText:
分かってる──この最終戦、
最初から全開で行かせてもらうぜ……

engChrName: Mare!
engSearchText: Mare!
jpnSearchText: ……《メア》！！

engChrName: Heehee! Maaare to the rescue! Okay, Van. Hope you're ready to...
engSearchText:
Heehee! Maaare to the rescue! Okay, Van.
Hope you're ready to...
jpnChrName: フフン、やっと出番ってワケね？ ──さあヴァン、準備は……
jpnSearchText:
フフン、やっと出番ってワケね？
──さあヴァン、準備は……

engChrName: ...Hmm? Uh, yeah. Ready to go!
engSearchText: ...Hmm? Uh, yeah. Ready to go!
jpnChrName: ……？ ああ──纏うぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
……？
ああ──纏うぜ！！

engChrName: Umm... O-Okay. Shard swell... The Grendel's all yours!
engSearchText:
Umm... O-Okay. Shard swell... The Grendel's
all yours!
jpnChrName: うん……えっと、シャード解放── 悪夢を纏え（テイク・ザ・グレンデル）……！
jpnSearchText:
うん……えっと、シャード解放──
悪夢を纏え（テイク・ザ・グレンデル）……！
（っ……？）

engChrName: Heh. Ah, there it is. I was wondering if you would pull the same trick again.
engSearchText:
Heh. Ah, there it is. I was wondering if you would
pull the same trick again.
jpnChrName: クク、なるほどな。 サルバッドでも見せてもらったが……
jpnSearchText:
クク、なるほどな。
サルバッドでも見せてもらったが……

engChrName: So that must be your nightmare, then?
engSearchText: So that must be your nightmare, then?
jpnChrName: ──それが、お前の“悪夢”か。
jpnSearchText: ──それが、お前の“悪夢”か。

engChrName: ...Wh-What just—?!
engSearchText: ...Wh-What just—?!
jpnChrName: ッ……なんだ……！？
jpnSearchText: ッ……なんだ……！？

engChrName: Aaaaargh!
engSearchText: Aaaaargh!
jpnSearchText: ………う、ああああ……………

engChrName: M-Mare!
engSearchText: M-Mare!
jpnChrName: メ、メアちゃん……！？
jpnSearchText: メ、メアちゃん……！？

engChrName: Something's interfering with her AI!
engSearchText: Something's interfering with her AI!
jpnChrName: ＡＩの思考フレームが……！？
jpnSearchText: ＡＩの思考フレームが……！？

engChrName: Mare-Bear! Snap out of it!
engSearchText: Mare-Bear! Snap out of it!
jpnChrName: おい、メア公ッ……！？
jpnSearchText: おい、メア公ッ……！？

engChrName: No... This is all wrong...
engSearchText: No... This is all wrong...
jpnChrName: ちがう……こんなのちがう……
jpnSearchText: ちがう……こんなのちがう……

engChrName: This isn't who I am! This isn't me!
engSearchText: This isn't who I am! This isn't me!
jpnChrName: ──アタシじゃない！ こんなのアタシじゃないもんっ！
jpnSearchText:
──アタシじゃない！
こんなのアタシじゃないもんっ！
……！？

engChrName: Sh-She vanished...
engSearchText: Sh-She vanished...
jpnChrName: き、消えた……！？
jpnSearchText: き、消えた……！？

engChrName: The hell did you do to her?!
engSearchText: The hell did you do to her?!
jpnChrName: 何をしやがった……！？
jpnSearchText: 何をしやがった……！？

engChrName: Heh. What's wrong? You still have your restraints, do you not?
engSearchText:
Heh. What's wrong? You still have your restraints, do
you not?
jpnChrName: クク、どうした？ “枷”は纏ったままだろう？
jpnSearchText:
クク、どうした？
“枷”は纏ったままだろう？

engChrName: You should focus less on her and more on the battle at hand.
engSearchText:
You should focus less on her and more on the battle
at hand.
